steps.plaintext: Head to the Yasna Monument and look for Aranakula
steps.markdown: Head to the ◀Yasna Monument▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Yasna_Monument▷ and look for ◀Aranakula▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Aranakula▷

substeps.plaintext: If Aranakula runs away, return to the last location where Aranakula speaks with the player ("safe area") to continue.
substeps.markdown: If Aranakula runs away, return to the last location where Aranakula speaks with the player ("safe area") to continue.

substeps.plaintext: Aranakula cannot follow across water and will return to the last safe area once the player exits the water.
substeps.markdown: Aranakula cannot follow across water and will return to the last safe area once the player exits the water.

substeps.plaintext: There is no point in defeating the Fungi as they do not drop materials and new Fungi will spawn.
substeps.markdown: There is no point in defeating the Fungi as they do not drop materials and new Fungi will spawn.

steps.plaintext: Go to the place that Aranakula mentioned
steps.markdown: Go to the place that Aranakula mentioned

steps.plaintext: Clear the spores that cover the stones
steps.markdown: Clear the spores that cover the stones

substeps.plaintext: The "branch" is located inside a cave. The entrance is at southwest of the hill, under a Four-Leaf Sigil.
substeps.markdown: The "branch" is located inside a cave. The entrance is at southwest of the hill, under a ◀Four-Leaf Sigil▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Four-Leaf_Sigil▷.

steps.plaintext: Make the three "leaves" turn towards the "branch"
steps.markdown: Make the three "leaves" turn towards the "branch"

substeps.plaintext: Follow the Seelie from the cave entrance to the three "leaves."
substeps.markdown: Follow the ◀Seelie▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Seelie▷ from the cave entrance to the three "leaves."
